mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERS_ID, STATUS, CARD_NUM, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, MOBILE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBERS
SELECT MEMBERS_ID, STATUS, CARD_NUM, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, MOBILE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBERS_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (MEMBERS_ID, STATUS, CARD_NUM, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, MOBILE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, LEAVE_DATE) VALUES SEQ_MEMBERS.NEXTVAL, #{status}, #{cardNum}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, SYSDATE, #{leaveDate}
